level.heading: Employer liability.
level.text: Benefits paid pursuant to this part shall not be charged to the experience rating accounts of employers, except that this section shall not apply to employers who have elected to make payments in lieu of contributions under ยง 51-103(f) and (h).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 15-171
level.text: For Law 15-171, see notes following ยง 51-131.
